title: Vuk or The Little Fox -- animated Hungarian movie, multi-languag
description:
Magyar (Hungarian) is the original language and is the given language on the dvd (wasn&#039;t an option I could find on The Pirate Bay&#039;s upload page). 

IMPORTANT:

THESE ARE NOT IMAGE FILES, and therefore cannot be opened by mounting with daemon tools.
I used the VLC Media Player to play them. To do that, on the VLC player click &#039;File&#039;, then click &#039;Open Directory&#039; and select the folder &#039;Vuk&#039;. This should take you to the main menu where you can click on &#039;languages&#039; and select English or whichever you like.


If you know how to transfer these files into an .iso file let me know and I&#039;ll do it and then re-upload it as an image file.  If you have any problems feel free to message me.
